main_locations.title: Main Locations
main_locations.no_locations: No main locations available for your organization.

ratings.nps_explain_body: We map happy → Promoter, medium → Passive, sad → Detractor and compute NPS_proxy = %Promoters − %Detractors = %happy − %sad. Scores range roughly from −100 to +100. This is a practical proxy using your current data.
ratings.simple_avg_hint: Also showing simple average of branch NPS (equal weight): {{value}} — for reference only. Weighted is recommended.
ratings.distribution_hint: Snapshot of happy/medium/sad in the current filter window.
ratings.happy_rate_branch: Happy Rate by Branch (Top 15 by rate, min 5)
ratings.happy_rate_employee: Happy Rate by Employee (Top 15 by rate, min 5)
ratings.data_hint: Charts and KPIs reflect server filters + client filters (branch/employee/quick).
ratings.daily_trend_title: Daily NPS proxy (bar = total, line = NPS)
ratings.channel_heuristic_hint: Channel detection is heuristic (Phone if notes_phone present, WhatsApp/Web if notes mention them, else Store).
ratings.rollup_note: Org rollup: Prefer weighted (sum counts then compute) over simple average of branches. Show sample sizes and flag low-n branches.

home.title: Ratings & NPS Home
home.subtitle: Customer feedback & NPS for {{org}}
home.no_permission: You don’t have permission to view this page.
home.welcome_message: Collect ratings (happy/medium/sad), compute NPS-style scores, and improve customer experience branch by branch.
home.tqm360_description: This module focuses on transactional ratings, NPS-style scoring, and branch/agent insights to drive loyalty.
home.announcements_coming_soon: Stay tuned—reports and automations are being rolled out incrementally.
home.nps_intro: Net Promoter Score measures how likely customers are to recommend your support experience to others.
home.nps_step1: Ask: “How likely are you to recommend our support based on this experience?” (0–10).
home.nps_note_proxy: Using your current 3-point scale: happy → Promoter, medium → Passive, sad → Detractor, so NPS_proxy = %happy − %sad.
home.examples_footer: Use weighted org rollup (sum counts then compute). Always show sample sizes; flag small samples.
home.collect_qr: QR posters at exit (scan to rate in 5 seconds).
home.collect_whatsapp: WhatsApp link in receipts or post-visit follow-up.
home.collect_after_ticket: Transactional survey after support ticket closure.
home.guard_sample: Low sample sizes (<20) are flagged as low confidence.
home.guard_trend: Track 7/28-day trend and split by branch/agent/channel.
